title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Rodgers, OBJ, Nick Wright on Mahomes Struggles, Justin Fields Hope with Dave Wannstedt and NFL Week 10 Best Bets
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Rodgers, OBJ, Nick Wright on Mahomes Struggles, Justin Fields Hope with Dave Wannstedt and NFL Week 10 Best Bets
description:
It's the best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast! First Colin's top takes of week, including what Aaron Rodgers should've realized before he spoke out (3:00), how Urban Meyer is proving his doubters wrong (6:00). and what OBJ can learn from Melo (9:00), Then, FS1's First Things First Host Nick Wright and Colin discuss the arrogance of Aaron (15:00), and what's behind Patrick Mahomes' baffling 2021 regression (23:00). FOX NFL Analyst and Former Bears and Dolphins HC Dave Wannstedt and Colin discuss why Justin Fields has Bears fans brimming with optimism despite another loss (31:00), and how the Cowboys' loss to the Broncos reminds him of a letdown game during his time in Dallas (36:00). Finally, The Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his NFL Week 10 bets are sharp or square with Saints/Titans (39:00), Aaron Rodgers facing off against Russell Wilson in Lambeau (42:00), and if the addition of OBJ will affect the Rams/Niners MNF matchup (44:00)

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
